text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/claim-decision defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
denied Denied The claim, or individual services, are not approved for any payment. This may also be known as 'rejected'.
approved Approved The claim, or individual services, are approved as submitted.
partial Partial The claim, or individual services, are approved at an amount less than as submitted.
pending Pending The adjudication processing is not complete. This may be due to requiring manual review or receipt of additional information.

name: ClaimAdjudicationDecisionCodes
title: Claim Adjudication Decision Codes
description: This value set provides Claim Adjudication Decision codes.

concept.definition: The claim, or individual services, are not approved for any payment. This may also be known as 'rejected'.
The claim, or individual services, are approved as submitted.
The claim, or individual services, are approved at an amount less than as submitted.
The adjudication processing is not complete. This may be due to requiring manual review or receipt of additional information.
